author: makkamine

You can log in using the member username and password you received when you signed up.Know the Team Behind Makka MineMakka Mine is a revolutionary project of Makka Mine Limited. The company is aimed at replacing the traditional Payment structure and creating a marketplace with global reach.Benefits of Makka Mine Charity Program❖ Free Education, Books and Materials To The Children ❖ Free Children Living And Refined Meals❖ Free Medical Expenses for the Health of the ChildrenWhat Are The Makka Mine's Core Values➔ To bring the various professionals under one umbrella for effective and faster communications ➔ Intelligently connecting the best of the best professionals to the consumer for an incredible outcome Makka Mine The Revolution in Finance this World Needs!Learn, Invest, Earn, and Grow Together.Communication DetailsMakka Mine LimitedCompany number: 1406322461 Gloucester Street Pimlico, London, United Kingdom, SW1V 4DZEmail: Support@Makkamine.ccWebsite: https://makkamine.ccWhitepaper: https://makkamine.cc/images/makkamine.pdf

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: I'm not a fan of cloud mining.The moment I hear cloud and mining together, I just skip even without been told because if not all clod mining, then almost all or majority of tye cloud mining are all scam projects and I think you should also check the scam accusation board.OP please you shouldn't get me wrong bit I'm just trying to air my mind and opinion and it might not be easy to get people from this forum to buy and ney into your vision because there are already alot of negative things said about cloud mining and people wouldn't want to risk their time and money in cloud mining especially from a newbie member and I think you should hire a nice graphics designers and a manager to help you out on this.

comments.author: makkamine
comments.body: I understand you don't have enough knowledge of cloud mining and its potential. comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I confess that I had to wait a while before posting because since I saw your thread I couldn't stop laughing, honestly explain the following to me:- How is it possible to have a decentralized mining company? and things only get worse because you still talk about decentralized cloud mining- Post videos of your mining farm, we want to see all the mining equipment you have- how much money did you invest in these mining equipment?- where is your mining farm located?- can you post all your employees?- how much do you profit from your mining farm? Do you have to show the entire profit report to be able to analyze whether your mining farm will be able to pay investors?and this:this can only be a joke, right? you know all hyip/ponzi sites have this

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: makkamine on January 12, 2023, 10:08:18 AMIf you are looking for a Reliable Platform To Stake your Crypto Fund and Earn with it, You didn't answer all the questions I asked you, it looks like you avoided answering all the questions I asked you because you don't know what you would answer me, so there is a great chance that you are lying about everything you are talking about, I saw a scam accusation against your site but I still asked you all those questions because I was hoping to give you another chance to hear your side of things but you just ignored all my questionsyou preferred to choose the path of lies, I keep asking myself what you really expect when following this path because let's be honest, if you created this site to be your business then if it is a ponzi scheme then you will not make a profit with it, you can even get it deceive and steal money from some people but in addition to becoming a thief and a criminal you will not have an honest and long-term business

comments.body: Invest and Earn with Makka MineMakka Mine’s Investment plans you Should Know AboutCheck Out the six packages and what they offer. Then select a package, make an investment, and start using Makka Mine to generate passive income.PALLADIUM: Palladium is the most affordable investment plan at Makka Mine  You can start with as low as $10 and can have a daily return at 0.50%. With a lock-in period of 500 days, you will get back the principal return and bonus of $1.OSMIUM: You can invest $30 and can have a daily return at 0.70%. With a lock-in period of 500 days, you will get back the principal return and bonus of $1.50.IRIDIUM: You can subscribe to this package with just a $50 investment. With the same lock-in period as above two plans, it offers daily returns at 1% rate and a bonus of $2.25.RUTHENIUM: This plan offers a daily return of 1.25% and bonus of $3. You can opt-in to this plan with an investment of $100. Lockin time is 500 days and your principal amount will be returned.PLATINUM: With this investment plan you can get a daily return of 1.50% and a bonus of $4.30.
